entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom The common flu has a mortality rate of 1%. Covid-19 has a mortality rate of 2%. The only pandemic is you. Stop destroying our livelihoods. Open up the state. Stop scaring people. You’re acting like a terrorist dictator.
